description.p: Browse the Internet in private without leaving a trace of history on your computer. Ephemeral is a stripped down private browser that's perfect for avoiding persistent cookies or web trackers. Close the window and all traces of your browsing are removed from your device.

description.p: Ephemeral protects you in five key ways:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Always incognito. From the second you open an Ephemeral window until you close it (or hit the Erase button), Ephemeral is in private browsing mode. That means history, cookies, local storage, passwords, etc. are all blown away as soon as you leave.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Sandboxed. Each window uses a separate instance of the browser engine, domains inside each window are rendered using different processes, and the engine‚Äôs processes are sandboxed from one another to keep you safe. Sign into a service in one window, and sites in other windows will have no idea.
3Ô∏è‚É£ No third-party cookies. Ephemeral blocks cookies from third-party sources, which cuts down on advertising cookies and other unwanted forms of cross-site tracking.

4Ô∏è‚É£ No telemetry. Ephemeral does not touch the network until you explicitly load a web page or perform a search. Even then, no usage data is ever collected‚ÄîI have no idea what you do with Ephemeral, and I don't want to know!

5Ô∏è‚É£Ô∏è Ephemeral uses DuckDuckGo‚Äîthe search engine that doesn‚Äôt track you‚Äîby default to avoid as much Google tracking as possible. You can also choose StartPage.com from the menu if that‚Äôs your preference, or even set your own entirely custom search engine.

Make privacy a habit by opening links in Ephemeral by default, knowing you can always jump back into a traditional browser like Epiphany, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Brave‚Äîor any other installed browser‚Äîwith one click. Perfect in case you want to use saved passwords or other extensions.

Remember, Ephemeral and any browser's incognito or private mode can only do so much: they mitigate some tracking and don't store data on your device, but they won't stop your ISP, government, or determined websites from tracking you.
For the best protection, always use a VPN.

Navegueu per Internet en mode privat sense deixar restes a l'historial del vostre ordinador. Ephemeral √©s un navegador privat simplificat perfecte per evitar les cookies persistents i els rastrejadors. Tanqueu la finestra i totes les traces de la vostra navegaci√≥ s'esborraran de l'ordinador.

Cerqueu directament des de la barra d'adreces
Escolliu entre els cercador respectuosos amb la privadesa del men√∫
Premeu Ctrl+W per tancar la finestra actual o Ctrl+Q per tancar-les totes

description.p: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Sempre d'inc√≤gnit. Des de l'instant que obriu una finestra d'Ephemeral fins que la tanqueu (o premeu ¬´Esborra¬ª), Ephemeral est√† en mode de navegaci√≥ privada: l'historial, les ¬´galetes¬ª, l'emmagatzemament local, les contrasenyes‚Ä¶ tot s'ho emporta el vent tan prompte com eixiu del programa.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Res de telemetria. Ephemeral no toca la xarxa fins que carregueu expl√≠citament una p√†gina web o realitzeu una cerca. Encara llavors, no se guarda cap dada d'√∫s: no tinc cap idea de qu√® f√©u amb Ephemeral, i no tinc cap inter√©s en saber-ho!

Teniu present que Ephemeral i els modes privats de qualsevol altre navegador tenen l√≠mits: tot i que disminueixen algunes formes de rastreig i prevenen l'emmagatzemametent local de dades, no poden parar el vostre prove√Ødor de servei, el govern o determinats llocs web.
Per la millor protecci√≥n, utilitzeu sempre una VPN.

Suchen Sie privat im Internet, ohne Spuren auf Ihrem Computer zu hinterlassen. Ephemeral ist ein vereinfachter, privater Browser - perfekt um bleibende Cookies oder Verfolger zu vermeiden. Schlie√üen Sie das Fenster und alle Spuren werden von Ihrem Ger√§t entfernt.
N√ºtzliche Funktionen:

ul.li: √ñffnen Sie Seiten m√ºhelos in jedem anderen installierten Browser
Suchen Sie direkt in der URL-Leiste

description.p: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Immer inkognito. Von der Sekunde, in der Sie ein Ephemeral-Fenster √∂ffnen, bis Sie es schlie√üen (oder den L√∂schen-Button dr√ºcken) ist Ephemeral im privaten Modus. Das hei√üt, dass der Verlauf, Cookies, lokal gespeicherte Passw√∂rter und sonstiges weg sind, sobald Sie ihn beenden.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Keine Telemetrie. Ephemeral greift nicht auf das Netzwerk zu, bis Sie explizit eine Webseite aufrufen oder nach etwas suchen. Selbst dann werden nie Daten gesammelt‚ÄîIch habe keine Ahnung, was Sie mit Ephemeral machen und ich will es auch nicht wissen!

Denken Sie daran, dass Ephemeral und der Inkognito-Modus oder private Modus in jedem anderen Browser nur so viel tun k√∂nnen: Sie k√∂nnen die Verfolgung ein wenig eingrenzen und keine Daten auf Ihrem Ger√§t speichern, aber sie werden Ihren Internetanbieter, die Regierung oder hartn√§ckigere Seiten nicht davon abhalten, Sie zu verfolgen.
Benutzen Sie immer ein VPN f√ºr den besten Schutz.

Explore Internet en privado sin dejar rastros de hist√≥rico en el equipo. Ephemeral es un navegador personal simplificado, ideal para rehuir de las ¬´cookies¬ª persistentes y los rastreadores. Al cerrar la ventana, todos los vestigios de su navegaci√≥n desaparecer√°n del dispositivo.

description.p: Ephemeral lo protege de cinco maneras fundamentales:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Siempre inc√≥gnito. Desde el instante que abre una ventana de Ephemeral hasta que la cierra (o pulsa en ¬´Borrar¬ª), Ephemeral est√° en modo de navegaci√≥n privada: el hist√≥rico, las ¬´cookies¬ª, el almacenamiento local, las contrase√±as‚Ä¶ todo se lo lleva el viento tan pronto como salga del programa.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Confinado. Cada ventana utiliza una instancia separada del motor del navegador, los dominios dentro de cada ventana se generan mediante diferentes procesos, y los procesos del motor se mantienen aislados unos de otros para asegurar su privacidad. Acceda a un servicio en una ventana, y las dem√°s ventanas no se dar√°n cuenta de lo ocurrido.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Sin ¬´cookies¬ª de terceros. Ephemeral bloquea las ¬´cookies¬ª de or√≠genes terceros, lo que reduce la publicidad persistente y otras formas indeseables de rastreo a trav√©s de varios sitios.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Nada de telemetr√≠a. Ephemeral no toca la red hasta que usted expl√≠citamente cargue una p√°gina web o realice una b√∫squeda. Aun entonces, no se recopila ning√∫n dato de uso: no tengo idea de lo que hace con Ephemeral, ¬°y no me interesa enterarme!

5Ô∏è‚É£Ô∏è Ephemeral utiliza DuckDuckGo ‚Äî‚Å†el buscador que no le rastrea‚Äî de manera predeterminada para evitar a Google tanto como se pueda. Si lo prefiere, tambi√©n puede elegir StartPage.com desde el men√∫ o incluso definir su propio buscador.

Haga de la privacidad un h√°bito al abrir enlaces en Ephemeral por omisi√≥n, sabiendo que basta una sola pulsaci√≥n del rat√≥n para volver a un navegador tradicional como Epiphany, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Brave o cualquier otro que haya instalado. Esto es pr√°ctico si quiere hacer uso de contrase√±as guardadas u otras extensiones.

Tenga presente que Ephemeral y los modos privados de cualquier otro navegador tienen l√≠mites: aunque mitigan ciertas formas de rastreo y previenen el almacenamiento local de datos, no pueden contra su proveedor de servicio, el gobierno o sitios web tenaces.
Para la mejor protecci√≥n, utilice siempre una VPN.

Fermez la fen√™tre et toutes les traces de votre navigation sont supprim√©es de votre appareil.

description.p: Ephemeral vous prot√®ge de cinq fa√ßons principales :

1Ô∏è‚É£ Toujours incognito. D√®s que vous ouvrez une fen√™tre Ephemeral et jusqu'√† ce que vous la fermiez (ou appuyez sur le bouton Effacer), Ephemeral est en mode navigation priv√©e.Cela signifie que l'historique, les cookies, le stockage local, les mots de passe, etc. sont effac√©s d√®s que vous partez.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Pas de t√©l√©m√©trie. Ephemeral ne touche pas le r√©seau tant que vous n'avez pas explicitement charg√© une page Web ou effectu√© une recherche. M√™me l√†, aucune donn√©e d'utilisation n'est jamais recueillie ‚Äî Je n'ai aucune id√©e de ce que vous faites avec Ephemeral, et je ne veux pas savoir !

N'oubliez pas qu'Ephemeral et le mode incognito ou priv√© de n'importe quel navigateur ne peuvent pas faire grand-chose : ils att√©nuent le suivi et ne stockent pas de donn√©es sur votre appareil, mais ils n'emp√™chent pas votre FAI, le gouvernement ou des sites web d√©termin√©s de vous suivre.
Pour une protection optimale, utilisez toujours un VPN.

Naviga il web in privato senza lasciare traccia della cronologia del tuo computer. Ephemeral √® un browser per la navigazione privata ridotto all'essenziale che √® perfetto per evitare cookie persistenti o web tracking. Chiudi la finestra e tutte le tracce della tua navigazione verranno rimosse dal tuo dispositivo.

description.p: Ephemeral ti protegge in cinque modi chiave:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Sempre in incognito. Dall'istante in cui apri una finestra di Ephemeral finch√© non la chiudi (o premi il tasto Elimina), Ephemeral √® in modalit√† navigazione in incognito. Questo significa che la cronologia, i cookie, l'archiviazione locale, le password, ecc... verranno tutti spazzati via non appena te ne vai.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Nessuna telemetria. Ephemeral non tocca la rete fino a che non sei tu a caricare esplicitamente una pagina od effettuare una ricerca. Anche in questo caso, nessun dato di utilizzo viene raccolto ‚Äî non ho idea e non voglio sapere di cosa tu faccia con Ephemeral!

Ricorda, Ephemeral ed ogni altro browser in modalit√† in incognito o privata pu√≤ fare solo questo: attenua il tracciamento e non memorizza i dati sul tuo dispositivo, ma non impedisce al tuo ISP, al tuo governo o a determinati siti di tracciarti.
Per una protezione migliore utilizza sempre una VPN.

description.p: Ephemeral beschermt je op vijf manieren:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Altijd priv√©. Vanaf het moment dat je Ephemeral opent totdat je afsluit (of op de knop Wissen drukt) staat Ephemeral in priv√©modus. Dat betekent dat je geschiedenis, cookies, lokale opslag, wachtwoorden, etc. gewist worden zodra je de browser afsluit.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Geen telemetrie. Ephemeral doet niks met je netwerk totdat je ervoor kiest om een webpagina te laden of een zoekopdracht uit te voeren. En zelfs dan worden er geen gebruiksgegevens verzameld. Ik heb geen idee wat je doet met Ephemeral en ik wil het niet weten ook!

Let op: Ephemeral en andere browsers met een priv√©-/incognitomodus kunnen niet alles voorkomen. De meeste manieren van volgen worden vermeden en er wordt niks opgeslagen op je apparaat, maar je provider, overheid of bepaalde daarvoor bestemde websites kunnen je nog steeds volgen.
Als je dat ook wilt voorkomen, gebruik dan een VPN.

description.p: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Zawsze incognito. Od chwili uruchomienia Ephemeral a≈º do jego zamkniƒôcia (albo klikniƒôcia przycisku Wyma≈º) przeglƒÖdarka jest w trybie prywatnym. Oznacza to ≈ºe historia, ciasteczka, lokalne pliki stron, has≈Ça itd. sƒÖ uprzƒÖtniƒôte od razu, gdy wychodzisz.

4Ô∏è‚É£ ≈ªadnej telemetrii. Ephemeral nie ≈ÇƒÖczy siƒô z internetem dop√≥ki nie za≈Çadujesz strony internetowej lub nie wykonasz wyszukiwania. Nawet wtedy ≈ºadne informacje na temat u≈ºytkowania nie sƒÖ zbierane ‚Äî nie mam pojƒôcia, co robisz z Ephemeral i nie chcƒô tego wiedzieƒá!

Pamiƒôtaj, Ephemeral czy tryb prywatny jakiejkolwiek innej przeglƒÖdarki nie mo≈ºe wszystkiego: blokuje czƒô≈õƒá ≈õledzenia i nie przechowuje danych na Twoim urzƒÖdzeniu, ale nie powstrzyma Twojego dostawcy, rzƒÖdu czy najbardziej upartych stron przed ≈õledzeniem Ciƒô.
Dla pe≈Çnej ochrony zawsze korzystaj z VPN.

description.p: O Ephemeral protege-o de cinco maneiras chave:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Sempre inc√≥gnito. Desde o segundo em que abre uma Janela Ephemeral at√© a fechar (ou premir o bot√£o Apagar), o Ephemeral est√° em modo de navega√ß√£o privada. Isto significa que todo o hist√≥rico, cookies, armazenamento local, palavras-passe, etc. s√£o apagados assim que sair.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Em sandbox. Cada janela usa uma inst√¢ncia separada do mecanismo do navegador, os dom√≠nios dentro de cada janela s√£o renderizados usando processos diferentes e os processos do mecanismo s√£o isolados um do outro para mant√™-lo seguro. Inicie sess√£o de um servi√ßo numa janela e os websites das outras janelas n√£o ter√£o ideia.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Sem cookies de terceiros. O Ephemeral bloqueia cookies de terceiros, o que reduz cookies provindos de an√∫ncios e outros modos de rastreio com dados cruzados.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Sem telemetria. O Ephemeral n√£o utiliza liga√ß√£o de internet at√© que explicitamente abra uma p√°gina da web ou realize uma pesquisa. Mesmo assim, nenhum dado ser√° recolhido‚ÄîN√£o tenho ideia do que far√° com o Ephemeral, e n√£o quero saber!

5Ô∏è‚É£Ô∏è O Ephemeral utiliza o DuckDuckGo‚Äîmotor de busca que n√£o o segue por predefini√ß√£o para evitar o maior n√∫mero poss√≠vel de seguimentos no Google. Tamb√©m pode escolher o StartPage.com a partir do menu se for essa a sua prefer√™ncia, ou mesmo definir o seu pr√≥prio motor de busca totalmente personalizado.

Fa√ßa da privacidade um h√°bito ao abrir liga√ß√µes no Ephemeral por predefini√ß√£o, ao saber que pode sempre saltar para um navegador tradicional como Epiphany, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Brave‚Äîou qualquer outro navegador instalado - com um clique. Perfeito no caso de querer utilizar palavras-passe guardadas ou outras extens√µes.

Lembre-se, o Ephemeral e modo inc√≥gnito ou privado de qualquer outro navegador por si s√≥: conseguem impedir algum rastreio e n√£o armazenam dados no dispositivo, mas n√£o v√£o impedir o seu ISP, governo, ou determinados websites de o rastrear.
Para a melhor prote√ß√£o, utilizar sempre uma VPN.

Navegue na internet privadamente sem deixar rastros ou hist√≥rico no seu computador. Ephemeral √© um enxuto navegador privado que √© perfeito para evitar cookies persistentes ou rastreadores da web. Feche a janela e todos os rastros da sua navega√ß√£o ser√£o removidos do seu dispositivos.
Recursos √∫teis:

ul.li: Abra facilmente as p√°ginas em qualquer outro navegador instalado
Pesquise diretamente da barra de endere√ßo
Aperte Ctrl+W para fechar a janela atual ou Ctrl+Q para fechar todas as janelas

description.p: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Sempre em modo inc√≥gnito. Do segundo em que voc√™ abre uma Janela Ephemeral at√© fech√°-la (ou apertar o bot√£o Apagar), Ephemeral estar√° em modo de navega√ß√£o privada. Isso significa que hist√≥rico, cookies, armazenamento local, senhas, etc. sumir√£o imediatamente quando voc√™ sair.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Sem telemetria. Ephemeral n√£o usa a conex√£o de internet at√© que voc√™ expl√≠citamente abra uma p√°gina da web ou realize uma pesquisa. Mesmo assim, nenhum dado ser√° coletado‚ÄîN√£o tenho ideia do que voc√™ far√° com o Ephemeral, e n√£o quero saber mesmo assim!
Para uma prote√ß√£o melhor, use sempre um servi√ßo de VPN.

Bilgisayarƒ±nƒ±zda herhangi bir ge√ßmi≈ü izi bƒ±rakmadan internette gizli olarak gezinin.Ephemeral, a≈üaƒüƒ±dakiler i√ßin m√ºkemmel olan √∂zel bir tarayƒ±cƒ±dƒ±r.Kalƒ±cƒ± √ßerezlerden veya web izleyicilerinden ka√ßƒ±nmak. Pencereyi ve t√ºm izleri kapatƒ±rg√∂z atma s√ºrenizi cihazƒ±nƒ±zdan kaldƒ±rƒ±lƒ±r.
Kullanƒ±≈ülƒ± √∂zellikler:

ul.li: Sayfalarƒ± y√ºkl√º ba≈üka bir tarayƒ±cƒ±da kolayca a√ßƒ±n
Doƒürudan URL √ßubuƒüundan arayƒ±n
Men√ºden arama motorlarƒ± arasƒ±ndan se√ßim yapƒ±n
Men√ºden JavaScript'i hƒ±zla devre dƒ±≈üƒ± bƒ±rakƒ±n veya yeniden etkinle≈ütirin
‚≠êÔ∏è simgesi veya Ctrl + D ile URL √∂nerilenlere ekleyin
Ctrl+F ile sayfadaki metni bulun
Ge√ßerli pencereyi kapatmak i√ßin Ctrl + W tu≈ülarƒ±na veya t√ºm pencerelerden √ßƒ±kmak i√ßin Ctrl + Q tu≈ülarƒ±na basƒ±n.

description.p: Ephemeral sizi be≈ü temel yolla korur:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Her zaman gizli. Saniyeler i√ßinede ge√ßici pencere a√ßƒ±n veyakapatƒ±n (veya Sil d√ºƒümesine basƒ±n), Ephemeral √∂zel tarama modunda, ge√ßmi≈ü, √ßerezler, yerel depolama, ≈üifreler vb. kapatƒ±r kapatmaz hepsi silinir.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Telemetri yok. Ephemeral, siz a√ßƒ±k√ßa belirtmedik√ße aƒüa dokunmazbir web sayfasƒ± y√ºkleyin veya bir arama yapƒ±n. O zaman bile hi√ßbir kullanƒ±m verisi toplamaz ‚Äî Ephemeral ile ne yaptƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±z hakkƒ±nda hi√ßbir fikrim yok.

Unutmayƒ±n, Ephemeral ve herhangi bir tarayƒ±cƒ±nƒ±n gizli veya √∂zel modundan daha fazlasƒ±: izlemeyi azaltƒ±rlar ve cihazƒ±nƒ±za veri depolamazlar,ancak ISS'nizi, h√ºk√ºmeti veya belirli web siteleriniseni izliyor.
En iyi koruma i√ßin her zaman bir VPN kullanƒ±n.

ul.li: –®—É–∫–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ç–µ–∫—Å—Ç –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ–Ω—Ü—ñ –Ω–∞—Ç–∏—Å–Ω—É–≤—à–∏ Ctrl+F

component.summary: O navegador que est√° sempre em modo inc√≥gnito
De webbrowser waarmee je altijd priv√© surft
Il browser web sempre in modalit√† in incognito
El navegador web que siempre va de inc√≥gnito
Der Webbrowser, mit dem man immer inkognito surft

description.p: Automatically Open Sites Externally

You can now always open chosen sites externally, bypassing Ephemeral! On a page, open the "Open page in‚Ä¶" menu and check the new "Automatically Open This Site Externally". Opening a link to that site will now open in your selected other browser instead of in Ephemeral; super handy for things like Twitter or GitHub where you always want to be logged in. To revert it, just open the site in Ephemeral and uncheck "Automatically Open This Site Externally" from the "Open page in‚Ä¶" menu.
Improved reliability of setting the window title; the title seen in the Dock menu or Multitasking View should now more reliably match the page's title, especially when updated with JavaScript.
Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Translation updates

ul.li: Translated to Portuguese thanks to Hugo Carvalho
Updated Dutch translations thanks to Quinten

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Developers, Developers, Developers!

ul.li: Access WebKit Web Inspector and developer tools via Inspect Element
New hard refresh action (bypassing the cache) with Shift+Ctrl+R
Support for elementary OS 6, including the dark style preference
Several new site suggestions

description.p: Translation updates

ul.li: Translated to Ukranian thanks to Ihor Hordiichuk
Updated Brazilian Portuguese translations thanks to Karl Prieb
Updated Turkish translations thanks to Safak GENISOL

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Updated Spanish translations thanks to Adolfo Jayme-Barrientos
Sandboxing

ul.li: Enabled WebKit‚Äôs subprocess sandboxing
Enabled WebKit‚Äôs process swapping on cross-site navigation, meaning separate domains are sandboxed from one another

description.p: Search engine changes

ul.li: Switched to DuckDuckGo search by default since it supports a dark style
Enabled strict Safe Browsing by default for DuckDuckGo to avoid unwanted results
StartPage.com remains an available option in the menu
Other search engines or configurations can be added under ‚ÄúCustom Search Engine‚Ä¶‚Äù in the menu, as always

description.p: Updated Italian translations thanks to Mirko Brombin
Fool me twice‚Ä¶

ul.li: Remove sometimes-problematic dark style workaround CSS since it was fixed in WebKit
Ensure correct browser icon size is set
Remove dark style toggle when forcing a -dark stylesheet

description.p: Minor Fixes

ul.li: Fix entry selection color when using the light style
Improve styling on other platforms/stylesheets by being less ambitious

description.p: Helping Hand

ul.li: Suggest turning on "Close when opening externally" if Ephemeral notices you frequently doing it yourself
Turkish translations thanks to Safak GENISOL

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Translation updates

ul.li: Translation system improved thanks to @NathanBnm

description.p: Dark Style Rises

ul.li: A new toggle lets you choose light or dark style for sites, assuming they support the `prefers-color-scheme` CSS query
Stopped defaulting to dark style by default since it can break some sites
Set the window title to help distinguish different pages from the dock
Simplified "Open page in‚Ä¶" menu and logic to always expose all options

description.p: Translation updates

ul.li: Updated Dutch translations thanks to Heimen Stoffels
Updated French translations thanks to @NathanBnm

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Minor updates

ul.li: Fixed checkbox and radio button styling
Treat ‚Äúlocalhost‚Äù as a valid domain
Improved dark styling when building with newer versions of WebKit
Under the hood changes to make translations easier
Updated Spanish translations thanks to Adolfo Jayme-Barrientos and @riesp

description.p: üéâÔ∏è Emoji (and international character) support for domains! Punycode means domains like i‚ù§tacos.ws will show up properly in the URL entry, while phishing domains should still show up like xn--80ak6aa92e.com
Translation updates

ul.li: Updated Dutch translations thanks to Heimen Stoffels

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Adding Some Polish üíÖÔ∏è

ul.li: üíªÔ∏è Touchpad gesture navigation: Use a two-finger swipe to move back or forward through your browsing history
üîóÔ∏è More room for the URL entry to breathe: spacing on each side plus a maximum width means the window is easier to grab and move around
UI styling fixes, plus dark style fixes for newer versions of WebKit
Code cleaning to keep things fresh and clean

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.

Use Ctrl+D to add/remove a site from the suggestions

Hello from Thessaloniki

ul.li: Fixed window closing: now closing the first window does not close the rest
Simplified ‚ÄúErase‚Äù to always close the window instead of sometimes opening a new one

description.p: Additional translations for new features will appear in future updates as translators have a chance to do their thing.
Summer cleaning! Because that‚Äôs a thing, right?

ul.li: Fixed the ‚ÄúOpen Link in New Window‚Äù menu item to actually do what it says
Fixed opening target="_blank" links in a new window with Ctrl- or middle-click
Updated the base color in menus and dialog windows from the default elementary slate-ish black to a new deep, dark blue-ish purple
Tweaked the ‚ÄúOpen Link Externally‚Äù dialog to better isolate protocols like ‚Äúmailto‚Äù or ‚Äútel‚Äù
Significantly cleaned up and reorganized the codebase to make future features and fixes easier

No foolin'. Two major new features:

ul.li: üîçÔ∏è New Custom Search Engine setting in the Menu
‚≠êÔ∏è Add your own websites to the suggestions using the new button in the URL entry

description.p: Plus the usual iterative improvements:

ul.li: Various URL entry fixes and tweaks
Updated Dutch translations thanks to Heimen Stoffels
Updated French translations thanks to @NathanBnm

description.p: Blaze It

ul.li: New option to close the window when opening a page in an external browser
The web view is now focused when navigating

description.p: URL Entry Fixes

ul.li: Updated and corrected several autocomplete domains
No longer attempt to force HTTPS on protocol-less domains‚Äîfixes several popular sites
Strip whitespace from URL entry before navigating‚Äîfixes instances where trying to navigate to a domain would perform a search

description.p: URL Suggestion Fixes

ul.li: Corrected joinmastodon.org TLD
Added additional useful sites
Added descriptions for more sites
Removed dead sites
Updated translations

description.p: All New Search + Suggestions

ul.li: The URL entry will offer to complete over 400 popular sites*
New Search Engine choice in the Menu
Switched to Startpage.com by default
Happy birthday, Katie!

description.p: *This data is all shipped with Ephemeral itself, and Ephemeral still does not touch the network until you explicitly navigate somewhere. The list of domains is heavily inspired by a similar feature in Firefox Focus. Domains being included in completion suggestions are not an endorsement, it simply means that domain is relatively popular.
Guten Tag! German translations thanks to Hannes Schulze
–ó–¥—Ä–∞–≤—Å—Ç–≤—É–π—Ç–µ! Russian translations thanks to Artem Polishchuk
More translations:

ul.li: Lithuanian translations thanks to @welaq
Updated Dutch translations thanks to Heimen Stoffels

description.p: Fixed some missed translations and updated French translations. Thanks again, @NathanBnm!
Lots o' goodies:

ul.li: The last-used browser is remembered for next time
New "Reset Preferences" menu item and dialog
Ctrl+O to open the current page in another browser
Refined (ever-so-subtly less flat) HeaderBar design
Ephemeral is now translatable!

description.p: Translations:

ul.li: ¬°Hola! Spanish translations thanks to Adolfo Jayme-Barrientos and Mario Rodrigo
salut! French translations thanks to Nathan (@NathanBnm)
Ol√°! Brazilian Portuguese translations thanks to Lucas Sanchez dos Anjos
Hallo! Dutch translations thanks to Heimen Stoffels

description.p: Styling fixes for non-native platforms.
Fixed a few small issues with zoom:

ul.li: Zoom controls are now only sensitive when the web view is visible
Reported zoom level is now correct when opening a new window
Reported zoom level is now kept in sync across open windows

description.p: Zoom! And more‚Ä¶

ul.li: A new menu to keep the UI tidy and balanced
Zoom in, out, and default from the new menu or with the keyboard
New Window action moved into the menu
Added a Quit All Windows action to the menu
Smooth scrolling when using the keyboard or a scrollwheel
Fixed Twitch livestreams
Fixed YouTube resolution support: now up to 4K!
Code cleaning to keep things fresh and clean

description.p: Better error handling and quality of life improvements all around:

ul.li: New approval dialogs for external apps, e.g. appstream or ftp protocols
New warning when no network connection
Prettier errors using native views
Stopped throwing away text when unfocusing URL entry
Stopped searching when the URL entry is empty
Code cleaning to keep things smelling fresh

description.p: Fresh styles to keep things funky, plus more:

ul.li: The new start page makes Ephemeral faster and makes it not touch the network until you're ready to browse
Middle- or Ctrl-click a link to open it in a new window
Displayed URLs are kept in sync for pages that manually update the URL without a page load
Local HTML files can now be opened
More informative "set as default" infobar
Tweaked "set as default" infobar styling
Search from URL entry!
Asks (politely!) to be set as the default browser
Open unsupported links (like AppCenter ones) in the OS-default app
Add "New Window" to headerbar, app launcher, and keyboard shortcuts
Collapse external browsers into a menu when there's more than one

description.p: Add several useful keyboard and mouse shortcuts
Fix links that try to open in a new window
Initial release for AppCenter
